name: Image to Text Converter
desc: Extract the text from the image and Convert it into ‘pdf’, ‘doc’ and ‘txt’ format.

name: Plant Species Recognition
desc: 'Plant species recognition using CNN in deep learning' aims to develop a deep learning-based model for accurately identifying and classifying plant species

name: Youtube Comment Sentiment Analysis Using NLP
desc: Using sentiment analysis to evaluate the user comments' tone and categorize them as positive, negative, or neutral using SentimentIntensityAnalyzer and SentiWordNet text analysis methods in the NLTK library.

name: Questions Similarity Detection
desc: A mini project on NLP to detect the similarity between the questions using Jaccard similarity, cosine similarity and Euclidean distance using Python.
